name: Dubious Arcade
description:
Dubious Arcade

A new game - EVERY 10 seconds!

Try to beat 10 in a row yourself or compete with up to 3 friends!

---

Game Development:

This game was developed by a team of nine enthusiasts (and two doggies).

All of the aspects of the game where developed within 72 hours of Ludum Dare 51, from idea to final build, and everything but balance, polish and bug-fixing was finished during the first 48 hours.

All assets in the game where made by the team.

We had an amazingly fun time doing this! <3

---

For more info on the development of this game, find us on Itch:

https://ocwal.itch.io/dubious-arcade

And see our documented progress here:

https://twitter.com/dubious_potions

https://www.instagram.com/dubious_potions
